channel.title: Comments on: The Bangs and The Beard

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/the-bangs-and-the-beard/#comment-343">Suzi</a>.
Sure!! Haha! I think I felt like I had more hair options without my bangs, and I am NOT using them to their maximum potential right now. They aren't covering my hairy eyebrows at all.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Suzi.

Sure!! Haha! I think I felt like I had more hair options without my bangs, and I am NOT using them to their maximum potential right now. They aren’t covering my hairy eyebrows at all.

item.title: By: Suzi
item.dc:creator: Suzi
item.description: I'm in that will I or won't I stage with my bangs right now...they're getting so long, and I've been thinking about just letting them grow. But, I love how put together they make me look, with minimal effort. Plus, not having to put foundation on my forehead has got to be saving me some money, right?
item.content:encoded: I’m in that will I or won’t I stage with my bangs right now…they’re getting so long, and I’ve been thinking about just letting them grow. But, I love how put together they make me look, with minimal effort. Plus, not having to put foundation on my forehead has got to be saving me some money, right?

item.title: By: Erin-Kurley
item.dc:creator: Erin-Kurley
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/the-bangs-and-the-beard/#comment-335">Sarah Cosper</a>.
You're a good friend. This is why you're the boss of my hair! HA!!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Sarah Cosper.

You’re a good friend. This is why you’re the boss of my hair! HA!!

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/the-bangs-and-the-beard/#comment-330">JenW</a>.
That's what I think too! Like, I was just like, should I go get my eyebrows done today? Or just clean up the ones that show? Hmmm...
item.content:encoded:
In reply to JenW.

That’s what I think too! Like, I was just like, should I go get my eyebrows done today? Or just clean up the ones that show? Hmmm…

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/the-bangs-and-the-beard/#comment-331">Erin-Kurley</a>.
Erin. You have to learn there ain't no shame in yo game! Your short hair looks boss on you. The way to look your fucking best is to work with what you have in the way it wants to be worked. Your hair is never going to be straight without soooo much time, effort and product. So, FUCK IT! It doesn't love you! Let it go....give it to God. You look cool as HELL.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Erin-Kurley.

Erin. You have to learn there ain’t no shame in yo game! Your short hair looks boss on you. The way to look your fucking best is to work with what you have in the way it wants to be worked. Your hair is never going to be straight without soooo much time, effort and product. So, FUCK IT! It doesn’t love you! Let it go….give it to God. You look cool as HELL.

item.title: By: Erin-Kurley
item.dc:creator: Erin-Kurley
item.description: Ugh, I'm having dreams of growing my hair out again. DAMN YOU and your beautiful normal-textured hair!!
item.content:encoded: Ugh, I’m having dreams of growing my hair out again. DAMN YOU and your beautiful normal-textured hair!!

item.title: By: JenW
item.dc:creator: JenW
item.description: My bangs are practically grown out and I miss them! They are a lazy girls dream because even when you don't want to do your hair, if you can manage to do your bangs, you look somewhat put together. You look smokin hot!
item.content:encoded: My bangs are practically grown out and I miss them! They are a lazy girls dream because even when you don’t want to do your hair, if you can manage to do your bangs, you look somewhat put together. You look smokin hot!
